_sText: THIS IS BETA2 OF ZM_RUINS_OF_VILLAGE by Di@blo$ and Thomasddq™ After almost 1 year of work , we can release a beta for our map . We actually know the most of the bugs , but if you find some , tell us pls. The map is based on a after-war village , then it is partly destroyed. <<<<< BETA 2 >>>>> what's news ?! - 2 news teleporters - News hideouts - No more vending machines - 3d skybox - Less yellow - Scattered weapons - More spawns - Some textures changed - No fog Bugs fixed : - Lights bug in the farm 's attic and in the church - Truck's smoke (only 1 guy has a fps loss) <<<<< BETA 1 >>>>>> URL The map has : - Traps - Secrets hideouts - A radio that play music (need to be activated , it plays everywhere in the map) - Teleporter (only 1) - Enought spawns - Hidden weapons (a MG is hidden then unlimited ammo could kill the gameplay) Prefabs used : My Shack My Shed Chrazini's letters Download, test, comment and rate pls ☺♥ CREDITS : Original Authors : Thomasddq - Mapping , prefabs Diablos - Mapping , textures Contributors : Sardox - test/bugs Terrora(Alex) - test/bugs others - test/bugs Pulp_orange - mapping CHRAZINI - letters prefab Zincoshine - Lights bug Thx , Thomasddq™
